cons: Over the past few years, the management has fired and forced out the best people. This is puzzling as TCCH is struggling. We had some great providers, great pharmacy staff. review_title: This is not as perfect as some of these reviews state
job_title: Healthcare Provider in Tri Cities, WA
cons:
As many have read, some reviews ion this site state that the clinic is friendly, helpful to providers, allows for growth, and there is nothing bad to say. These reviews all sound the same and are obviously NOT written by the real employees. The negative reviews are FAR closer to reality. The reviews that describe the heaven-like nature of TCCH are written by management.

I would say that TCCH has some good people, ones not in management. It is difficult to believe what a CEO says when he cannot look you in the eye. The next day, he says something different to another person.
